name: Reindeer Drops (TwistedHawk)
description:
It's that magical time of year, where the holidays are near. The children are all snuggled under their beds, waiting for old St. Nick to appear. For the good know they'll get marvelous gifts wrapped with red shiny bows. But for the bad ones out there who always get in trouble with their pop? Well, Santa is here to deliver a nice steamy Reindeer Drop!

Instructions:

Enter or Return - Pause Game

X or O - Drop Gift

C or P - Deliver Reindeer Drop

ASDF or Arrow Keys - Move
